评论详情: I got this backpack on sale, but it would have been worth the full price if I'd paid it. It's well made, the color is lovely, and it's held up to some serious abuse while traveling. There's a lot of space without the backpack feeling bulky (I'm a small person, so backpacks can be overwhelming on me) and it packs down flat to stow away when I'm not using it. I might buy another in another color because I like it so well.

评论概述: Es muy pequeño distinto a cómo se ve en la foto

Sturdy and fashionable!

This product isn't great the zipper broke within 1 month. It's cute and my daughter loved it but I ordered 1 and the zipper broke, so I ordered another because I missed the return window and the new one broke too. Crappy quality in my opinion
I use it everyday I work  Neatly holds my belongings

I was looking for a small backpack for daily use. Small enough to take a few things, large enough for my laptop - and this fit the bill perfectly. It doesn't have many of the features other bags have, most of which I never used anyway. My only complaint is in the magnetic fasteners for the front pockets. If you don't line them up perfectly, they don't work at all. But other than that - I'm very happy.
One of the attachment snapps was wrong but I used it anyway.  Like the look and it held up well during my trip.
Got for a 3rd grader it's a perfect size it works great the durabilty it outstanding
Awesome product, great deal!!
Beautiful backpack perfect for my laptop and amazing quality
It has a beautiful design, good capacity
We’ve been looking for a laptop back and let me tell you, this one was a hit! Definitely recommend, great sturdy material, stylish and practical.
It's A Good Size 🫣 Good Storage Bag The Quality Is Real Nice 💋🥺It's Very Thick The Zip & Everything Is Good Quality 🥰 It Values The Money 🤑 The Color Is Okay 🤩 But I Love It 🩵

评论概述: Very sturdy, reliable, laptop computer carrying backpack
评论详情: I bought this as I needed some thing to haul around my laptop and other personal items. The shoulder straps are wide and very comfortable. The zippers are made very well and sturdy. Would be great for school, work, or like me for personal uses. The green color I received is great. May buy more for gifts at this price.

I love this bag! I’ve needed a smaller laptop backpack for times I’m not lugging my entire life around. This suits my needs perfectly! I can fit my purse-like items in the middle pocket and my computer, pen pouch, and notebook in the back, along with a sweater/sweatshirt. The front pouch is great for things I need to grab quickly. The snaps are magnetic so they are easy to snap back together. The bag itself is pretty comfortable to wear. It’s nice and light, and easily adjustable. I really love the color and style too. I’ve taken it to one meeting and got compliments on it already.  The only drawbacks are the side pouches and the thickness of the laptop padding. The side pouches are small. I fit my favorite water bottle in there so it works for me, but it does need to be a thinner bottle. The padding for the laptop sleeve is on the thin side. So, like most things containing laptops (tablets, etc), I wouldn’t toss it around.

I purchased two of these backpacks and I’m now ordering a third. I carry one to work everyday and the other to church and I ordered an additional one for my go to weekend backpack. I love the color, texture and style. Order them you will not go wrong.
We live on a sailboat and take our laptops to the library often. So far, this backpack keeps the kids laptop dry and protected
I love the color and the feel. It has a compartment inside perfect for my laptop!
Material feels a bit cheap, I ended up using a different bag. Size is good fits many things the zippers go along with material it feels cheap

The backpack itself isn’t bad. My daughter didn’t like the style but I thought it was alright. It looks pretty much like the product photos. I bought it because it was similar to a backpack she already had but the dimensions seemed bigger. I returned it because it wasn’t any larger than the one she had. The large compartment is only about 5” deep, so the 6.9” depth  has about 3” of small front pocket. That didn’t give her any extra useful space to fit her binder, folders, laptop, etc. It wasn’t worth keeping.

I use this every workday for walking or biking to work. My MacBook fits in it snuggly and I have room for lots of other things. I like that the outer most pocket is quick and easy to open. I can slip my phone in and out with one hand with ease. It gets compliments and the colors are great. I've also traveled through airports with it and it fits easily into teeny tiny overhead compartments and can fit under the seat in front of me. Several months later it still looks great.
Un bulto muy necesario para viajar. Los colores son idénticos a los de la foto y cuenta con bastante lugares para colocar artículos.
I just love the vintage look of this bag. The mint green and brown leather is a really nice combo. A decent size for school or travel.

It's a good quality bag but not what I'm looking for. Yes it is very spacious and could fit most laptops and many tablets too. I could fit my s9 ultra without problems but I'm not gonna use it. It lacks ruggedness. They should have at least provided more protection at the bottom. That way, you just don't alway have to gently put down your bag. I remember getting my iPad 3 dented on one of its corners like 13 years ago so now, I'm very careful with the bags I put my gadgets in. If you don't mind these negatives though, it's a great bag. It's good quality and stylish too.
I call this the Perfect  backpack !!!!! Well made and has that sophisticated look. Versatile for the office or school.

I absolutely love the color of this backpack... It's so different from any other color I've seen which makes it great for when you have a number of backpacks lying around and you have to find yours. Love the old fashioned design... Brings back some memories! Love this size and the number of pockets as well. This will be a lot of fun for travel this summer.
This bag has plenty of pocket. It is well built and the price point is great.
The seller was very polite and order  ame when it stated it would. I love accessories such as bags. This bag, though I haven't used it yet, is very roomy and seems very durable.
